task_description: 将平面插画风格的烤鸭转换为Pixar 3D ICON风格

operation_params.style_reference: Pixar 3D cartoon style, Q-version cute design, high-gloss surface texture, dual light source (top + 45° front), pure white background
operation_params.additional_prompt: Convert this flat illustration of roast duck into Pixar 3D ICON style. Transform into 3D with glossy roasted skin texture, natural brown color with highlights, crispy appearance. White ceramic plate with smooth finish. Show realistic roasting marks and oil gloss. Pure white background. 1024x1024px, commercial quality.

metadata.notes: HOO XIANG品牌烤鸭3D ICON转换
